thread.title: home away home
thread.title_full: home away home - Review of AKA Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: hananir
title: home away home
text: stayed on business for long periods - most recent 5 weeks. great location, staff extremely helpful, gym real nice, Apartment well kept. location location location, near by subway stations many lines, restaurants, grocery store free coffee or tea every morning. This time they did not have the lounge available - so I missed the happy hour they used to have previously 3 day a week. I hope this tradition is back soon :)
